title: The Prince of Tennis - Showdown in England`s Tennis Fortress
alternative_title: Tennis no Ouji-sama Movie 2: Eikokushiki Teikyuu Shiro Kessen!, 劇場版テニスの王子様 英国式庭球城決戦！
description: Seigaku travels to England to play a tournament representing Japan but they are attacked by a group of street tennis players who were banned from playing official tournaments because of their rough play.
